prompt: Create a modern onboarding screen with a clean, minimalist design featuring a large illustration at the top occupying 40% of the screen height, followed by a bold primary heading in dark gray (Colors.grey[800]) using 28px font size and FontWeight.bold. Below the heading, include a descriptive subtitle in medium gray (Colors.grey[600]) with 16px font size explaining the app's main benefit. At the bottom, place two action buttons: a prominent 'Get Started' button with rounded corners (12px radius) in blue (Colors.blue) with white text, and a 'Skip' text button in gray. Add generous padding of 24px around all content and ensure proper spacing between elements using SizedBox widgets. The background should be clean white, and all text should be center-aligned for optimal visual hierarchy.
